services.title: Our Services
services.description: Book a consultation with our advisory team

FR.banking: Opulanz is a digital banking platform. Banking services are provided by licensed partners regulated by ACPR (Autorité de Contrôle Prudentiel et de Résolution).
FR.investment: Investment services are subject to MiFID II regulations and provided by advisors authorized by AMF (Autorité des Marchés Financiers).
FR.insurance: Insurance distribution is subject to IDD (Insurance Distribution Directive) requirements. Opulanz acts as an insurance intermediary.
FR.mortgage: Mortgage services are provided by licensed credit intermediaries. Subject to responsible lending requirements.

LU.banking: Banking services are provided by licensed and regulated partners.
LU.investment: Investment advisory services comply with Luxembourg law and MiFID II regulations.
LU.insurance: Life insurance products distributed in compliance with Luxembourg insurance law and IDD requirements.
LU.mortgage: Mortgage services provided by regulated credit institutions in Luxembourg. Subject to consumer protection laws.

metadata.title: Opulanz - Professional Digital Banking
metadata.description: Trusted digital banking, company formation, and advisory services for entrepreneurs and businesses in France and Luxembourg.

landing.heroSubtitle: Access carefully selected European real estate opportunities through professionally managed Special Purpose Vehicle (SPV) structures, available exclusively to qualified investors.

whatIsSpv.title: What is an SPV?
whatIsSpv.description: A Special Purpose Vehicle (SPV) is a dedicated legal entity created specifically to hold and manage a real estate asset. Each SPV isolates the investment, providing clear legal separation, professional governance, and transparent reporting for investors.

protection.title: Asset Protection
protection.description: Each SPV isolates the property asset, shielding investors from unrelated liabilities.

governance.title: Professional Governance
governance.description: Expert management, regulatory compliance, and fiduciary oversight throughout the SPV lifecycle.

transparency.title: Full Transparency
transparency.description: Detailed quarterly reports, audited financials, and full visibility into SPV operations and performance.

exit.title: Defined Exit Strategy
exit.description: Structured maturity terms and predefined exit options as set out in contractual documentation.

howItWorks.title: A Private, Invitation-Based Process
howItWorks.description: Our SPV investment opportunities are available exclusively through a private, invitation-based process to ensure regulatory compliance and investor suitability.

contact.title: Initial Contact
contact.description: Reach out to our advisory team to express your interest in real estate SPV investment opportunities.

qualification.title: Qualification Review
qualification.description: Our team reviews your investor profile, conducts suitability assessments, and completes KYC/AML verification.

access.title: Portal Access
access.description: Qualified investors receive secure portal credentials to view available SPV offerings and documentation.

investment.title: Investment & Monitoring
investment.description: Select opportunities, complete documentation, execute via bank transfer, and track your investment over time.

cta.title: Interested in SPV Investment Opportunities?
cta.description: Contact our advisory team to learn more about current and upcoming real estate SPV investment opportunities. Access is available by invitation only.

contactForm.title: Request Information
contactForm.description: Provide your details and our team will be in touch to discuss SPV investment opportunities.
contactForm.messagePlaceholder: Please describe your investment interests and objectives...
contactForm.success: Thank you for your interest. A member of our team will contact you shortly.
contactForm.disclaimer: This page is provided for informational purposes only and does not constitute a public offer, solicitation, or investment advice. Access to detailed investment information is available exclusively through restricted, invitation-based access following appropriate investor verification.

login.error: Invalid access code. Please contact your advisor for assistance.
login.help: Need access? Contact your Opulanz advisor or reach out to our team.
login.securityNotice: This portal is restricted to authorised investors only

bankTransfer.important: Important: Please include the payment reference to ensure your investment is correctly allocated to this SPV.

offeringDetail.disclaimer: This information is provided to authorised investors only and does not constitute investment advice. Past performance is not indicative of future results. All investments carry risk, including the potential loss of capital.
